summary: craft the 9 amulets: you need to have arcane smithing perk in smithing tree, and the blessing of the amulet you currently want to craft
descriptionHtml:
craft the 9 amulets: you need to have arcane smithing perk in smithing tree, and the blessing of the amulet you currently want to craft
so yea, go pray at a shrine of talos, have the arcane smithing perk, and boom, go craft yourself a talos amulet in the jewelery section

not adding screenshots since it's a simple concept

amulets require leather strips (except stendar's cause it's made of chains), ingots to match the color of the amulets, and for some amulets, flawless gems (like dibella amulet requires flawless amethyst, arkay requires ruby, and so on).
author: me
